properties.body:
EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER
   NOTICE BY M/V RAMFORM ATLAS TOWING
   12 8000 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   30-56.40S 014-10.80E, 30-39.00S 013-20.40E,
   30-28.20S 013-07.80E, 30-03.60S 013-43.80E,
   30-01.80S 014-25.80E.
   EIGHT MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 18/24.
